name: Clefairy

evolution.description: Clefairy can evolve into Clefable at level 8 and above with the help of a Moon Stone. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Fairy Pokémon. Adored for their cute looks and playfulness. They are thought to be rare, as they do not appear often.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you can impose disadvantage on an enemy attack roll of your choice.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.description: If this Pokémon is subjected to a move that forces it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage on a success.

abilities.name: Friend Guard
abilities.description: Once per long rest, when an ally within 15 feet of this Pokémon is hit by an attack, it may choose to halve the damage dealt.
